explanation: [0-0] A game character in yellow clothing stands on a yellow plane, facing right, carrying a black backpack. Beside the character is a desert with a few trees in the distance. The screen displays white subtitles on a black background: "Tapping Master" and a golden crown emoji. In the lower right corner, there is an image of two guns.
[0-2] Next, the character in yellow runs to the right and opens the scope. The screen switches to the scope view, showing a desert vehicle driving in the distance.
